title: SwellPublicPermissions
description: Restricts which fields and operations are allowed through the unauthenticated storefront API when `public` is false or omitted.

scope.description: Optional scope limit. Use `account` to require the caller to be an authenticated customer.

fields.description: Whitelist of fields that are readable through the public API.

expands.description: Custom expansion URLs for link fields in public API responses. Keys are field names, values define the URL pattern (e.g. {'product': {'url': '/products/{product_id}'}}).

url.description: URL pattern for expanding the link, with field interpolation (e.g. '/products/{product_id}').

input.description: Controls which fields can be modified via the public API (e.g. when customers submit forms).

scope.description: Restrict write access to authenticated customers.

fields.description: List of fields that may be written by the public endpoint.
